actions.Sharktoothed Longsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands. Against a target is wearing no armor, the reaver deals an extra die of damage with this sword.
actions.Javelin: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
